name: ALONE (itch) (twych)
description:
In this first-person shooter, you play as a lone survivor who has crash-landed on an alien planet. Stranded and alone, you must gather resources to rebuild your ship and escape the planet. But it won't be easy - the planet is filled with dangerous alien creatures.

Controls:

This game is designed to be played with a keyboard and mouse.
The controls are:

  • [WASD] - Movement
  • [Mouse Move]  - Look around
  • [Left Mouse Click] - Use weapon
  • [E] - Interact

Made for a Unity Developer Community game jam.
